markdownRemark.html:
nerdear.la is a bilingual convention about technology and people that takes place every October in Argentina.

This year’s agenda includes eminent minds like Brian Kernighan and Alan Kay. It’ll also features not-quite-but-rather-dim me. I’m giving my first-ever talk and it’s about technical writing.

The event starts on October 20 lasts 5 days (I’m on the 2nd day). It usually takes place at Ciudad Cultural Konex, but this year it’s going to be completely online. You can get your tickets for free at eventbrite.

frontmatter.description: I'm giving a talk about writing at nerdear.la
frontmatter.title: I'm in nerdear.la 2020
